name: Bumpin' Time
description:
Hello! Welcome to the Bumpin' Time page ♥

This was a college project solo developped in order to experiment with the 3Cs (Character, Controller, Camera) .

Timeframe: 1 Month.

Play as a fighter experimenting with her two new weapons : The toy hammer and the magic whip. Dummies are at your disposition to test your skills, will you be able to achieve the perfect infinite combo and never make your opponent fall? It's up to you!

This game is a prototype, it is not in a development state anymore and may contain bugs/glitches as it was made in such short time for a college assignment.

If you encounter any problem, reset the map with "T"

This game is playable with both controller and keyboard/mouse. 

Controls are shown in the pause menu.

VA: https://twitter.com/shishishiena?lang=en

Developer: https://twitter.com/Paichooli
